title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: In the Navigator, the options to open or close a project are sometimes available and sometimes not.
EB: Either both options should always be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Navigator. 2. Select both P1 and P2 and observe the availability of the open/close options.
